director.name: 汤姆·科斯特洛 Tom Costello

this_title: Power, Profit And Populism: The Battle for Hard Brexit
introduction: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson calls the Brexit referendum an “amazing moment for the country”, a rebellion of the “little people” against the faceless EU bureaucracy. But what if Brexit was ultimately not about the “will of the people” at all, but about the interests of a small British elite?
chinese_title: Power, Profit And Populism: The Battle for Hard Brexit
